phrases: I walk through the white pages of my storybook
that is just waiting to be painted
with a kaleidoscope of my experiences
aa yawarakakute atatakai kimi no te
Your hand is so warm held within mine
nigiri shimete sono kokoro no oku made todoku you ni
It reaches all the way into my heart
hohoenmi de kumeta nara nigirikaeshite kuretara
I cannot see a brighter future
boku wa tada mae wo miteru
than you smiling and taking my hand as well
Sawako can perform exorcisms for you.
I can get all of them to work together!
Having Ryu and Kazehaya in the class will make things convenient for you.
Chizu will be helpful during the sports festival.
Oh, and chocolate for you because I respect you so much!
douka i am about to dake wa furimukanaide
Please do not look at me right now
The sun's set, the wind's blowing,
and we are so close that we can almost touch
My gaze has always been fixed on you
I do not mind if this emotion is what they call love,
and I do not care if I get hurt by it
I just want to tell you, over and over again
I am off to school now!
And I am a 2nd year student.
What class are Chizu and Ayane in?
We still have two years until graduation.
Let us make the most of them!
That was more nerve wracking than I thought it would be.
We were really lucky, were not we?
Tomo and Ekko are in our class too.
I would have been really lonely if we were not in the same class...
I feel like I am dreaming right now!
I will bring a CD tomorrow.
This girl's name is Sawako Kuronuma.
You guys can call her Sadako if you would like!
Seems like things are still the same.
It is time for the opening ceremony.
Ryu, let us make this a good year!
I dreamt that I was going out with her!
I cannot believe we are all in the same class again!
Why do you look like you know something I do not?
You did not give the chocolates to him?
But you spent all that time making them!
Something definitely happened on Valentine's Day.
Things have been so awkward and strained since then.
It could be that she is finally come to realize how she feels about him...
We had spring break and holidays and everything!
Sawako, love is all about timing.
It is been bothering me since that day...
Does that mean that Kazehaya does not like dating?
Please work hard at both your academics and your extracurricular activities.
Or could it possibly be that he already has someone he likes?
I feel like I can understand
what Kurumi meant now when she said that she wished Kazehaya could just remain everyone is beloved Kazehaya
They do not have any hidden meaning to them?
We are in the same class,
and he even said good morning to me.
All of that is like a dream come true, and yet...
I just cannot forget what it was like when it was just the two of us.
to want more of that, would not it?
I would have hidden intentions then, would not I?
Wow, we are sitting next to each other!
So people like this really exist.
You look kind of scary now.
Alright, let us hurry up and pick our committee members.
But this is not the time for me to be scared!
No one wants to do it...
Oh my gosh, that was close.
I almost took away someone is fun!
Will not I get lots of attention that way?
You will never get as much attention as me.
Wow, that guy next to Sawako's pretty bold.
I nominate Kuronuma for class life rep.
Kuronuma's really good at taking care of the flowers.
You are always taking care of the flowerbeds for us!
If it is too much, I will help too!
Next, the atmosphere rep will be...
I will tell you all you need to know about being class rep and respecting your homeroom teacher.
That is why I told you not to do that.
Hassles can be fun, do not you think?
You can go on without me.
Who said I was going to wait?
I will see you guys tomorrow!
I am off to the library.
Are you going home now, Kuronuma?
I am going to stay for a bit and plant some seeds in the flowerbeds.
Then I will see you around.
Today was just the opening ceremony and you already have practice?
Hey, has the date been decided yet?
I will go ask your dad next time I see him.
Oh yeah, you guys have a tournament coming up?
Will you go to Koshien if you win?
The spring tournament is more of a practice run.
Well, it is still good if you win, right?
I will come over for ramen tonight!
What do you mean for what?
Remember what I said to you?
As if I bothered listening to all of your requests.
A lot of things happen 2nd and 3rd year, right?
It is basic human kindness not to want to separate good friends.
After 1st year, it is easy to tell who the good friends and not so good friends are.
You were not even homeroom teacher for the whole
That handsome teacher's name was Kazuichi Arai.
The man who will one day become president!
What a waste of time and chocolate.
Have a good time together while you are here.
It is weird to hear that after hearing him brag about himself first.
Why do not you get a girlfriend?
You are quite popular after all.
Do you already have someone you like?
Do you know anything about personal privacy?!
If it is someone I know, I will help you.
This is not like you, Yano.
I would want to tell the person who I like first before I tell anyone else.
That did not work at all.
Seems like he is the type who does not like it when others try to interfere.
Well, I suppose it is something that the parties in question should take care of themselves.
I guess I have to hold myself back
unless the timing does not work out.
This corner will be for medicinal plants!
I did not think that he would still be here.
You planted a lot of seeds.
I thought that he would already gone home.
It is been so long since it was just the two of us.
Wait, what am I supposed to do when this happens?
We are in the same class.
But we cannot talk as much because our seats are farther apart now.
We will be together until graduation now.
It makes me so happy that Kazehaya and I can be in the same class until graduation.
And it makes me want to be with him even more.
I was waiting for you, Kuronuma.
I considered myself the closest to you out of all of the guys.
But that is not necessarily true.
I did not mean to put you in an awkward position by saying that suddenly.
It is just that there was nothing I could say that would not mean something special.
A smile that captured everyone is attention.
